SurfacePropertiesNull Class Reference

Class invoked when no surface properties are required, like in the case of a purely catalytic surface modeled with the gamma model. More...

Detailed Description

Class invoked when no surface properties are required, like in the case of a purely catalytic surface modeled with the gamma model.
